title: Day 36 - Away From Home
itunes:title: Day 36 - Away From Home
itunes:subtitle: The Bad Days
description:
When you run, what are you running from? A person? A place? When you run, and you think it's gone...how do you know?

***

Written by Charlie Davenport

***

Please consider supporting the podcast at Patreon.com/Creepypod or creepypod.com/support

***

Sound design by Steve Blizin

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko
